dexmate_features.introductionText: Dexmate is a small project that arises from the need to have a system that can automatically create and manage store products. The application is divided into several parts: the frontend developed with React and hosted on Vercel, the backend developed with Node.js and Express, hosted on Netlify, and the MongoDB database managed by Atlas. Additionally, several external services are used for specific functionalities such as image and document storage, email sending, real-time translations, and image generation. The idea is that the system can autonomously generate products using artificial intelligence to create descriptions, images, and other necessary data for selling the products.
dexmate_features.systemArchitectureText: The application architecture is divided into the following components
dexmate_features.frontendSimpleText: Developed in React and hosted on Vercel
dexmate_features.backendSimpleText: Developed in Node.js and Express, hosted on Netlify
dexmate_features.reactText: React is a widely used JavaScript library that is highly effective for building interactive and dynamic user interfaces. Its component-based approach allows for modular and reusable application development, making both development and code maintenance easier. The vast developer community and the large number of libraries and tools available make React a robust and reliable choice.
dexmate_features.vercelText: Vercel provides a continuous and scalable deployment platform that integrates seamlessly with code repositories like GitHub and GitLab. Its ability to handle automatic deployments every time a push is made to the main branch ensures that the frontend is always updated with the latest version of the code. Additionally, Vercel optimizes web application performance through CDN and edge caching techniques, ensuring a fast and smooth user experience.
dexmate_features.nodeText: Node.js is a server-side JavaScript runtime environment that efficiently handles multiple simultaneous connections, which is essential for applications with high concurrency.
dexmate_features.expressText: Express is a minimalist framework for Node.js that facilitates the creation of RESTful APIs and route and middleware management, offering a clean and straightforward structure for developing the backend.
dexmate_features.netlifyText: Netlify is known for its ease of use and for offering serverless functions that are useful for certain backend aspects, such as Lambda functions. Its integration with version control systems and its ability to handle continuous deployments make maintaining and updating the backend a simple and efficient process.
dexmate_features.mongoDBText: MongoDB Atlas is a cloud-managed NoSQL database that allows flexible scaling and management of large volumes of data. Its document-based data model is ideal for handling unstructured and changing data, which is common in modern applications. MongoDB Atlas offers high availability, advanced security, and automatic backup, ensuring that data is always available and protected.
dexmate_features.awsS3Text: AWS S3 is a highly scalable, secure, and reliable cloud storage service. It allows the storage of large amounts of data, such as images and documents, with high durability and availability. The integration with the AWS SDK for Node.js facilitates file management directly from the backend, enabling efficient upload and download operations.
dexmate_features.sendGridText: SendGrid is an email delivery platform that offers a robust infrastructure for handling transactional and marketing emails. Its API is easy to use and allows customization and tracking of the performance of sent emails. SendGrid's reliability and scalability ensure that emails reach their recipients in a timely and efficient manner.
dexmate_features.deeplText: Recognized as one of the most accurate machine translation services on the market. Its API allows real-time translation of texts with high quality, which is crucial for a store that operates in multiple languages and needs to offer accessible content to a global audience. DeepL's accuracy and speed significantly enhance the user experience, facilitating communication and understanding in different languages.
dexmate_features.gptText: API for generating text from an input
dexmate_features.dalleText: Advanced tool for generating images from textual descriptions. Using this technology allows offering visually appealing and personalized products, which is a key differentiator for the store. DALL-E's ability to create high-quality images from text enriches the product offering and improves customer satisfaction.
dexmate_features.stripeText: Credit card payment gateway system. Allows users to pay securely
dexmate_features.systemWorkflowText: The application is a store like any other. With products, cart, purchase, user system, stock, statistics, purchase notifications,... The difference is that the products are created automatically.
dexmate_features.systemWorkflowStep1: The administrator imagines the name of a product, entering it in an input
dexmate_features.systemWorkflowStep2: This name is sent to GPT to make a description and further develop the product
dexmate_features.systemWorkflowStep3: The application sends the product name and description to DeepL to translate it into several languages
dexmate_features.systemWorkflowStep4: The application sends the product description to DALL-E to generate an image
dexmate_features.systemWorkflowStep5: The application compresses the image and uploads it to AWS S3 and saves the URL in the database
dexmate_features.systemWorkflowStep6: Product editing is allowed, with instant translation
dexmate_features.lighthouseReport: The Importance of Google Lighthouse or PageSpeed Insights
dexmate_features.lighthouseReportText: Google Lighthouse is an open-source tool that allows evaluating the performance, accessibility, best practices, and SEO of a web page. It provides detailed metrics and recommendations to improve the quality and loading speed of a website, which is essential for offering an optimal user experience and improving search engine ranking. Therefore, Google Lighthouse recommendations will be considered to improve the quality and loading speed of the application, always aiming to have a good score.
